enchantment.iguanatweaksreborn.bane_of_s: Increases damage and slows down hissing creatures
enchantment.iguanatweaksreborn.luck.info: Increased loot from mobs and blocks. Higher chance for treasure from fishing
enchantment.iguanatweaksreborn.knockback: Increases knockback strength of the item
enchantment.minecraft.aqua_affinity.info: Ignores the mining speed penalty when underwater
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.info: Causes damage to enemies when they attack you
enchantment.minecraft.knockback.info: Increases knockback strength of the item
enchantment.minecraft.fortune.info: Increases yield from blocks, such as ores or crops
enchantment.minecraft.power.info: Increases the damage of arrows fired from the bow
enchantment.minecraft.punch.info: Increases the knockback strength of arrows fired by the bow
enchantment.minecraft.flame.info: Arrows shot are set on fire
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.info: Arrows have a chance to not get consumed when fired
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.in: Higher chance for treasure from fishing
enchantment.minecraft.lure.info: Decreases the amount of time it takes for a fish to bite the hook
enchantment.minecraft.frost_walker.info: Water under the user will freeze into frosted ice
enchantment.minecraft.mending.info: Repairs the durability of the item when XP is picked up
enchantment.minecraft.binding_curse.info: Prevents the cursed item from being removed from an armor slot
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.in: Destroys the cursed item if you die with it in your inventory
enchantment.minecraft.loyalty.info: Allows the trident to automatically return after being thrown
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.info: Increases damage to mobs touching water
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.info: Using the trident while in rain or water will launch the user forward
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.info: Allows the trident to summon lightning bolts during thunderstorms
enchantment.minecraft.multishot.info: Fires additional arrows in a cone
enchantment.minecraft.quick_charge.info: Decrease the time to reload the crossbow
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.info: Allows projectiles to pierce through mobs
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.info: Increases movement speed on soul blocks
enchantment.allurement.alleviating.info: Heals the user upon collection of experience
enchantment.allurement.ascension_curse.i: Causes the cursed item to float upwards when dropped
enchantment.allurement.fleeting_curse.in: Causes nearby entities to repel the cursed item when dropped
enchantment.allurement.launch.info: Launches the target upwards instead of away
enchantment.allurement.reeling.info: Pulls targets towards the user upon arrow impact
enchantment.allurement.reforming.info: Repairs the durability of items very slowly over time when in use
enchantment.allurement.shockwave.info: Creates a shockwave when taking fall damage that damages nearby entities
enchantment.allurement.spread_of_ailment: Applies the user's active effects to their arrows
enchantment.allurement.vengeance.info: Stores some incoming damage and applies it to the user's next attack
iguanatweaksreborn.weak_hoe: This hoe is too weak to till soil
iguanatweaksreborn.milk_cooldown: This %s's fluid is not yet ready
effect.iguanatweaksreborn.vigour.descrip: Decreases hunger/stamina consumption by 20% per level.
iguanatweaksreborn.no_damage_item: This item blade is not sharp, hits like a fist
iguanatweaksreborn.no_efficiency_item: This item is old and rusty, can't mine anything
iguanatweaksreborn.broken_item: This item is broken, must be repaired
iguanatweaksreborn.too_much_fishing_in_t: There's no more fish in this spot, maybe move a bit
iguanatweaksreborn.loose_bed_respawn_poi: Your respawn point is loose, you'll respawn in a radius from your bed.
iguanatweaksreborn.decorative_beds: Beds are just a nice decoration. No sleep allowed
iguanatweaksreborn.no_spawn_point: You cannot set a respawn point. Better leave a trace from the world's spawn.
iguanatweaksreborn.enjoy_the_night: Your respawn point has been set. Enjoy the night!
effect.iguanatweaksreborn.tired.descript: Obtained when haven't slept in a while. Reduces movement speed and sight.
iguanatweaksreborn.not_tired: You're not tired enough to sleep
iguanatweaksreborn.too_tired: You should really get some sleep
iguanatweaksreborn.no_food_for_sleep: You're too hungry and can't fall asleep
iguanatweaksreborn.spawner_reactivator: This item can reactivate a Mob Spawner
death.fell.accident.water: %s thought could drop in shallow water safely
iguanatweaksreborn.requires_corners: The portal needs Crying Obsidian in the corners to be activated
emi.info.iguanatweaksreborn.items.name_t: When applied to a named entity will drop the previous name tag. If the item is not renamed will remove the name from the entity.
emi.info.iguanatweaksreborn.crops.seeds: Can be found in the wild
